# TCGAgisticDB

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/TCGAgisticDB)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=TCGAgisticDB)
<!-- badges: end -->

> **Note**
> We recommend using the [TCGAgistic](https://github.com/CCICB/TCGAgistic) package to access the data by streaming it into your R session.


TCGAgisticDB is a database of precomputed GISTIC2 analyses.

Currently it only contains the firebrowse hg19 GISTIC2 analyses.
